Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\dA\\inni-platform" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Word doc table export, PDF direct analysis null safety, download button type error

- Add structured output table field \(headers/rows\) to Word document generation
- Fix NoneType iteration error in PDF direct analysis streaming/non-streaming paths
- Fix download button invalid binary data format for non-string results
- Update dspy_analyzer and other module changes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\dA\\inni-platform" add .env.example .streamlit/secrets.toml.example app.py auth/session_init.py blocks/block_manager.py blocks/block_sharing.py database/db_manager.py database/init_db.py database/supabase_client.py database/supabase_schema.sql pages/3_Document_Analysis.py requirements.txt)

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\dA\\inni-platform" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Migrate from SQLite + GitHub to Supabase PostgreSQL

- Replace SQLite db_manager with SQL-to-Supabase REST API translator
- Add supabase_client.py singleton module
- Add supabase_schema.sql for table creation
- Remove GitHub storage backup/restore from session_init, block_manager, app.py
- Add JSONB auto-parsing for session_data, progress_data, block_data columns
- Update requirements.txt with supabase package
- Update secrets.toml.example and .env.example with Supabase config

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\dA\\inni-platform" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix JOIN queries for Supabase compatibility

- Replace LEFT JOIN in admin_manager with Supabase foreign key select
- Replace LEFT JOIN in block_manager with Supabase foreign key select

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
